name: California Pasta Salad
description: If you’re looking for an easy and delicious pasta salad to bring to a potluck or picnic, this California pasta salad is perfect for you! It’s made with fresh summer veggies and topped off with zesty Italian dressing.
recipeIngredient: 2 cups cherry tomatoes, cut in half

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to the instructions on the package.

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk together the store-bought Italian dressing with the spices and the nutritional yeast.
recipeInstructions.name: Whisk together the store-bought Italian dressing with the spices and the nutritional yeast.

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and pour the dressing over the salad.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large bowl, combine all ingredients and pour the dressing over the salad.

recipeInstructions.text: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and red pepper flakes. Store the pasta salad in the fridge until you serve it. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Sprinkle with sesame seeds and red pepper flakes. Store the pasta salad in the fridge until you serve it. Enjoy!

keywords: California pasta salad, how to make California pasta salad, California pasta salad recipe
